FIZZ: An emission of a rapid stream of bubbles.
KICK: A hit or strike with the leg, foot or knee.
OOMPH: Strength, power, passion or effectiveness; clout.
PIZZAZZ: Flair, vitality, or zest; energy; vigor.
SPARK: A small particle of glowing matter, either molten or on fire.
VERVE: Excitement of imagination such as that which animates a poet, artist, or musician, in composing or performing
ZING: A short high-pitched humming sound, such as that made by a bullet or vibrating string.
